# t-carousel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                           | Type     | Default        |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------- |
| `direction`   | `direction`    | (optional) carousel display direction | `string` | `'horizontal'` |
| `totalSlides` | `total-slides` | carousel slides total number          | `number` | `undefined`    |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                            | Description                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| `--carousel-arrow-background`                   | Background of the carousel arrow                   |
| `--carousel-arrow-border`                       | Border of the carousel arrow                       |
| `--carousel-arrow-border-radius`                | Border radius of the carousel arrow                |
| `--carousel-arrow-color`                        | Color of the carousel arrow                        |
| `--carousel-arrow-cursor`                       | Cursor of the carousel arrow                       |
| `--carousel-arrow-display`                      | display of the carousel arrow                      |
| `--carousel-arrow-height`                       | Height of the carousel arrow                       |
| `--carousel-arrow-justify-content`              | Justify-content of the carousel arrow              |
| `--carousel-arrow-left`                         | left of the carousel arrow left                    |
| `--carousel-arrow-outline`                      | Outline of the carousel arrow                      |
| `--carousel-arrow-position`                     | Position of the carousel arrow                     |
| `--carousel-arrow-right`                        | Right of the carousel arrow right                  |
| `--carousel-arrow-top`                          | Top of the carousel arrow                          |
| `--carousel-arrow-transform`                    | Transform of the carousel arrow                    |
| `--carousel-arrow-width`                        | Width of the carousel arrow                        |
| `--carousel-arrow-z-index`                      | Z index of the carousel arrow                      |
| `--carousel-container-align-items`              | Align items of the carousel container              |
| `--carousel-container-box-sizing`               | Box sizing of the carousel container               |
| `--carousel-container-display`                  | Display of the carousel container                  |
| `--carousel-container-height`                   | Height of the carousel container                   |

| `--carousel-container-overflow`                 | Overflow of the carousel container                 |
| `--carousel-container-padding`                  | Padding of the carousel container                  |
| `--carousel-container-position`                 | position of the carousel container                 |
| `--carousel-container-vertical-flex-direction`  | Flex direction of the carousel container vertical  |
| `--carousel-container-width`                    | Width of the carousel container                    |
| `--carousel-height`                             | Height of the carousel                             |
| `--carousel-indicator-active-opacity`           | Opacity of the carousel indicator active           |

| `--carousel-indicator-position`                 | Position of the carousel indicator                 |
| `--carousel-indicator-transition`               | Transition of the carousel indicator               |
| `--carousel-indicator-vertical-height`          | Height of the carousel indicator vertical          |
| `--carousel-indicator-vertical-margin`          | Margin of the carousel indicator vertical          |
| `--carousel-indicator-vertical-width`           | Width of the carousel indicator vertical           |

| `--carousel-indicators-z-index`                 | Z index of the carousel indicators                 |
| `--carousel-position`                           | position of the carousel                           |

| `--carousel-slide-min-width`                    | Min width of the carousel slide                    |
